Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would equally benefit you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. We are confident that this investment will yield significant returns and meet your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
